subject: Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Spain’s Rafael Nadal, a master on clay, was buoyed by the cheers of 20,000 fans at Las Ventas arena in defeating The United States’ Andy Roddick, 6-4, 6-0, 6-4.
snippet: Spain’s Rafael Nadal, a master on clay, was buoyed by the cheers of 20,000 fans at Las Ventas arena in defeating The United States’ Andy Roddick, 6-4, 6-0, 6-4.
